faqs.a: Most clubs are free to join, while some may have small membership fees depending on the club and events.

faqs.q: Do I need experience to join?
faqs.a: No experience needed — beginners are welcome. Clubs often run workshops for different skill levels.
Yes — you can join as many clubs as you like and participate based on your time and interest.
Club managers create events; you can view details and register through ClubSphere. Payments (if any) are handled within the platform.

faqs.q: Can I suggest new clubs or events?
faqs.a: Yes! ClubSphere allows members to propose new clubs or events. Admins and club managers will review your suggestions and take action accordingly.

footer.description: Connecting clubs, events, and members seamlessly. Your platform for managing and joining communities with ease.
